Home Libraries People FAQ More

acos

Header: 
#include <boost/math/complex/acos.hpp>
Synopsis: 
template<class T>
std::complex<T> acos(const std::complex<T>& z);

Effects: returns the inverse cosine of the complex number z.

Formula:
